question_stem:
What needs to be changed to get the following code to run?

numpy error
question_stem_html:
What needs to be changed to get the following code to run?

numpy error

items.part_stem:
What needs to be changed to get the following code to run?

numpy error
items.part_stem_html:
What needs to be changed to get the following code to run?

numpy error
items.solution:
This will create an array with one dimension for y. It does not rectify the displayed error.

hstack is not a method that belongs to the numpy array x. It is defined in the numpy package.

If this was causing the error, the error would have been raised at the first line of the code chunk, not the last.
items.solution_html:
This will create an array with one dimension for y. It does not rectify the displayed error.

hstack is not a method that belongs to the numpy array x. It is defined in the numpy package.

If this was causing the error, the error would have been raised at the first line of the code chunk, not the last.
